scripts.test: echo "錯誤: 未來將添加測試" && npm run local-test
scripts.verify: npm run build && echo '🔍 驗證環境變數...' && node -e "if(!require('fs').existsSync('.env')){console.error('❌ .env 檔案遺失！'); process.exit(1);}else{console.log('✅ .env 檔案存在');}"
scripts.local-test: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); require('./lib/src/index.js'); console.log('✅ 本地語法檢查通過');"
scripts.analyze: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run build && echo '✅ 分析完成 - 準備部署！'
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions --project stock-health-staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions --project stock-health-app
